New Records: James Rodríguez set a record with his 11th assist in South American World Cup qualifiers
James Rodríguez equaled Falcao’s mark of 13 goals in World Cup qualifiers
Key Match Events: James Rodríguez scored a winning penalty after a video review
The match was tied 1-1 before Rodríguez's goal
The match was affected by extreme heat
Pre-Game Insights: Colombia had not beaten Argentina since 2019
Argentina was missing key player Lionel Messi
Post-Match Reflections: James Rodríguez praised the win and the team's performance
Argentina coach Lionel Scaloni acknowledged the impact of the heat
Miscellaneous Highlights: Colombia's win was significant in their World Cup qualifying campaign
The match was part of a busy day in South American qualifiers
